thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: John Collins
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by John Collins

author: John Collins
title: John Collins
text: I found the staff to be very helpful and knowledgeable on the runners and other products. Also they were patient and not pushy which enabled a good choice on the end product in terms of size and brand. Overall a very positive experience and I would definitely return for future purchases.
